title: Murshidabad (Lok Sabha constituency)
text:
Murshidabad (Lok Sabha constituency) is a <a href="Lok%20Sabha">parliamentary</a> constituency in <a href="Murshidabad%20district">Murshidabad district</a>, West Bengal, India. While six assembly segments of No. 11 Murshidabad (Lok Sabha constituency) are in <a href="Murshidabad%20district">Murshidabad district</a>, one assembly segment is in <a href="Nadia%20district">Nadia district</a>.
Assembly segments.
As per order of the <a href="Delimitation%20Commission">Delimitation Commission</a> in respect of the <a href="delimitation%20of%20constituencies">delimitation of constituencies</a> in the West Bengal, parliamentary constituency no. 11 Murshidabad is composed of the following segments from 2009:
In 2004 Murshidabad Lok Sabha constituency was composed of the following assembly segments:<a href="Lalgola%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Lalgola</a> (assembly constituency no. 55), <a href="Bhagabangola%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Bhagabangola</a> (assembly constituency no. 56), <a href="Murshidabad%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Murshidabad</a> (assembly constituency no. 58), <a href="Jalangi%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Jalangi</a> (assembly constituency no. 59), <a href="Domkal%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Domkal</a> (assembly constituency no. 60), <a href="Hariharpara%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Hariharpara</a> (assembly constituency no. 62), <a href="Karimpur%20%28Vidhan%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Karimpur</a> (assembly constituency no. 69)
Election results.
General election 2019.
 
General election 2014.
